input.sentences: somebody seems to be using a grill to burn sticks .
those hamburgers are going to be delicious .
what are the men doing here at night ?
they seem to want to set just about everything on fire .
hopefully | the men are keeping a close eye on their fires .
output.sentences: When camping, we made a grill with sticks to burn below it.
I prepared some delicious hamburgers to cook.
By the time we were ready, it was night.
We set the fire on the grill in order to start cooking the burgers.
Since it was dark, we were keeping an eye on the burgers so that it did not get burned by the fires.
